Youtube WET plugin

Example

Code

<div id="cdn-youtube">
</div>
<!-- Write closure template -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var youtube = document.getElementById("cdn-youtube");
	youtube.outerHTML = wet.plugins.youtube({
		title: "Suspect",
		url: "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9znKJqnFuuY",
		transcript: "http://healthycanadians.gc.ca/video/suspect-eng.php#trans"
	});
</script>

Parameters

Parameter Role Mandatory
title Title of the video Yes
url Youtube URL to the video Yes
transcript Link towards the transcript of the video No
